function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate use of infectious prevention methods in building design and construction","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks in built environments","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict infectious prevention measures and protocols in building design and construction","Technologies":"Air filtration and purification systems, contactless technologies, antimicrobial materials","People":"Occupants of buildings, construction and design professionals","Owner":"Architects, engineers, construction companies, building owners"},{"Description":"Insufficient consideration of building type in the effectiveness of prevention methods","Impact":"Risk of ineffective prevention methods for specific building types","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough assessments of building types to tailor prevention methods accordingly","Technologies":"Building modeling and simulation software, risk assessment tools","People":"Architects, designers, building managers","Owner":"Design and construction professionals, building owners"},{"Description":"Concentration of participants from high-risk regions in the study","Impact":"Potential bias in the evaluation of prevention methods based on regional prevalence of disease","Mitigation":"Ensuring diverse and representative participation from regions with varying disease prevalence","Technologies":"Online survey platforms, demographic analysis tools","People":"Study participants, researchers conducting the study","Owner":"Research team, study organizers"}]}
